author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes a reorganization of the ```MtdTracksValidation``` class in ```Validation/MtdValidation``` aiming at:

- simplify the code for matching ```TrackingParticle``` and ```PSimHit``` from MTD;
- add a dedicated test to extrapolation of tracks to the BTL surface, parallel to the studies proposed in the TDR, for direct comparison.

This update serves also as a basis for a private backport to the original TDR release 10_4_0_mtd5, for direct comparison with TDR results.

#### PR validation:

The code has been extensively tested on large (100k events) samples of muon and pion guns.
title: MTD Validation: update track validation, adding TDR-like study of extrapolation at BTL surface
